alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Grainger; Greene; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 03 at 2:58PM CST until March 03 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EST FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAWKINS...SOUTH CENTRAL HANCOCK...NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...NORTH CENTRAL COCKE...WEST CENTRAL GREENE...NORTHEASTERN GRAINGER AND HAMBLEN COUNTIES... At 357 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near White Pine, or near Morristown, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Bean Station, White Pine, Russellville, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, Mooresburg, Lowland, Treadway and Mohawk. This includes Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 4 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cocke; Grainger; Greene; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins; Jefferson
